plots: Rachel wants to have a place to sit in front of the TV but Joey tells her Rosita , the armchair , does not move .
Rachel tries to move the chair anyway and breaks it in half .

Rachel is moving a chair and asks for her friend 's help , Rachel then learns that the chair was named Rosita by the friend and is arranged so it is a perfect distance from other things in the house that are also named .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Central Perk, Chandler and Ross are on the couch talking. Phoebe is getting coffee.]

utterances.transcript: Hey, y'know what's weird? After you guys get married, when you introduce me to people you're gonna have to say, "This is my brother-in-law Ross." Not, "My friend Ross," "brother-in-law Ross." That's weird isn't it?
Couldn't I just say, "This is Ross?"
Sure, do whatever you want.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (disappointed) Sure, do whatever you want.
(Phoebe sits down between Chandler and Ross.)

utterances.transcript: Hey Ross! So, I was checking out the uh, real estate section...

utterances.transcript: Sorry!

plots: Monica finds an ad in the newspaper that Monica 's parents are selling their house and shows it off .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: The telemarketing office, Phoebe is still trying to talk Earl out of suicide.]

utterances.transcript: Earl, you're not hearing me! All I'm saying is that you're not alone all right? Everybody hates the people they work with!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Earl, you're not hearing me! All I'm saying is that you're not alone all right? Everybody hates the people they work with! (One of her coworkers overhears that, and she mimes that she didn't mean him.)

utterances.transcript: Hey guy!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (walking past Earl's desk) Hey guy!

utterances.transcript: Wait, what was that? That sounded like someone being nice to you.
No! That's just the "Hey Guy" guy. He says that to everybody! He's the worst! I'd like to take him with me!

All right so Earl, let's just forget about the people at the office, okay? There-there's gotta be someone else in your life worth sticking around for! What about-what about your family, your friends, or maybe your girlfriend?

No, whatever! Anything!
Hey guy!
Yeah, he's gotta go.
Okay, I should, I should probably be getting back to my thing now. See ya.

That's a good one! Do you hear that Ross? Three days!

utterances.transcript: Yeah! Yeah! Oh, this will make a great memory.
